dcmGridRowStatus

  • - directive in module dcm-ui.grid

The contents of this element are placed into the grid status cell (first cell) in the row's scope you can use $row.active, $row.dataLoading and $row.showLoading

Directive Info

  • This directive executes at priority level 0.

Usage

<dcm-grid-row-status> [state indicator here] </dcm-grid-row-status>
